ModMetaData.name: Rim-Effect: N7 beta 1
ModMetaData.author: Vanilla Expanded Team and Co.
ModMetaData.description:
Rim Effect: N7 features a number of unique, powerful weapons and armors from the N7 armory. It further enhances Systems Alliance faction with new pawn types that arrive in rare raids - N7 operatives, capable of using a host of abilities and game-changing weapons, sporting strong armors, omni-shields and their skill set, eclipsing that of normal Alliance footsoldiers.
This pack is a part of the Rim Effect mod series and requires Rim Effect: Core to work.
Do not share, redistribute, publish or use the assets from this mod without prior approval.
